CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK("http://maps.apple.com/?address="& Home_Service__r.Street__c &","& Home_Service__r.City__c &","& Home_Service__r.State__c &"+"& Home_Service__r.Zip__c, Home_Service__r.Street__c &" "& Home_Service__r.City__c &", "& Home_Service__r.State__c &" "& Home_Service__r.Zip__c)
CustomField.label: Address Link
